original: @109a # // rgya gar skad du //
analyzed: @109a # // rgya gar skad du //
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: ya m'a ri tu no tanta badzra dhrik / bod skad du /
analyzed: ya m'a ri tu no tanta badzra dhrik / bod skad du /
translated: Yama-mantra-vajradhrküîΩIn Tibetan:

original: rdo rje 'dzin pas gshin rje gshed po la bstod pa'i rgyud /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pas gshin rje gshed po la bstod pa'i rgyud /
translated: The Tantra of Vajradhara's Praise to Yamantaka

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Bodhisattva Manjushri, the youthful one.

original: de nas 'og min gyi gnas btsun mo'i bha ga @109b la //
analyzed: de nas 'og min gyi gnas btsun mo'i bha ga @109b la //
translated: Then, in the Akanishtha realm, in the bhaga of the queen,

original: khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed rang gi che ba bstod cing bzhugs so //
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed rang gi che ba bstod cing bzhugs so //
translated: The king of wrathful ones, Yamantaka, remained, praising his own greatness.

original: de'i tshe rdo rje 'dzin pas btsun mo'i bha ga rgyas par byas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe rdo rje 'dzin pas btsun mo'i bha ga rgyas par byas te /
translated: At that time, Vajradhara expanded the bhaga of the queen

original: gshin rje gshed po la bstod pa //
analyzed: gshin rje gshed po la bstod pa //
translated: And praised Yamantaka:

original: h'um khro bo'i rgyal po zhe sdang gshin rje gshed //
analyzed: h'um khro bo'i rgyal po zhe sdang gshin rje gshed //
translated: Hum! The king of wrathful ones, the wrathful Yamantaka,

original: rang bzhin spros bral chos kyi dbyings la gnas //
analyzed: rang bzhin spros bral chos kyi dbyings la gnas //
translated: Abides in the dharmadhatu, free from the elaborations of nature.

original: mtshan ma'i rtog med rang bzhin lhun gyis grub //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i rtog med rang bzhin lhun gyis grub //
translated: Without conceptualized characteristics, naturally spontaneously present,

original: 'chi bdag sdang 'joms ye shes gnyis med sku //
analyzed: 'chi bdag sdang 'joms ye shes gnyis med sku //
translated: The non-dual wisdom body that conquers the hatred of the lord of death,

original: dri med rnam dag thugs rje shugs las skyes //
analyzed: dri med rnam dag thugs rje shugs las skyes //
translated: Arises from the power of stainless, pure compassion.

original: 'bar ba'i sku mchog bcom ldan gshin rje gshed //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i sku mchog bcom ldan gshin rje gshed //
translated: The supreme blazing body, Bhagavat Yamantaka,

original: longs spyod bde ba chen po gnyis med 'khril //
analyzed: longs spyod bde ba chen po gnyis med 'khril //
translated: The great bliss of enjoyment, embracing non-dually,

original: kha sbyor 'dod chags skyon gyis ma gos shing //
analyzed: kha sbyor 'dod chags skyon gyis ma gos shing //
translated: The union of passion, unstained by the faults of desire,

original: thugs rje'i thabs kyis 'gro ba 'dul mdzad pa //
analyzed: thugs rje'i thabs kyis 'gro ba 'dul mdzad pa //
translated: With compassionate methods, taming beings,

original: drag po 'dul phyir mi bzad drag po'i gzugs //
analyzed: drag po 'dul phyir mi bzad drag po'i gzugs //
translated: For the sake of subduing Rudra, with an unbearable wrathful form,

original: khro bo'i rgyal po gzhan gyis khyod mthong nas //
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po gzhan gyis khyod mthong nas //
translated: When the kings of wrathful ones see you,

original: ngo mtshar rab tu 'jigs shing 'bros par 'gyur //
analyzed: ngo mtshar rab tu 'jigs shing 'bros par 'gyur //
translated: They are astonished, terrified, and flee.

original: khyod kyi thugs ni zhe sdang 'chi bdag 'joms //
analyzed: khyod kyi thugs ni zhe sdang 'chi bdag 'joms //
translated: Your mind conquers the lord of death, hatred,

original: nyon mongs bdud mdzad 'gro ba'i mgon po khyod //
analyzed: nyon mongs bdud mdzad 'gro ba'i mgon po khyod //
translated: You, the protector of beings, who acts as the demon of afflictions,

original: ma g-yos mi rtog chos kyi sku la gnas //
analyzed: ma g-yos mi rtog chos kyi sku la gnas //
translated: Abiding in the unchanging, non-conceptual dharmakaya,

original: rnam rtog dra ba gcod mdzad gshin rje gshed //
analyzed: rnam rtog dra ba gcod mdzad gshin rje gshed //
translated: Cutting through the net of conceptuality, Yamantaka,

original: zhe sdang thugs kyi rigs la phyag 'tshal lo /
analyzed: zhe sdang thugs kyi rigs la phyag 'tshal lo /
translated: I pay homage to the family of the mind of hatred.

original: spros med chos kyi dbyings las ma g-yos kyang //
analyzed: spros med chos kyi dbyings las ma g-yos kyang //
translated: Without wavering from the unelaborate dharmadhatu,

original: zhe sdang drag pos gdul phyir 'bar ba'i sku //
analyzed: zhe sdang drag pos gdul phyir 'bar ba'i sku //
translated: For the sake of taming with intense hatred, the blazing body,

original: 'chi bdag gshin rje pho mo gdan du btang //
analyzed: 'chi bdag gshin rje pho mo gdan du btang //
translated: With the male and female lords of death as your seat,

original: ma he'i thog na zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bzhugs //
analyzed: ma he'i thog na zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum bzhugs //
translated: And on a buffalo, with your two legs extended and contracted.

original: stobs ldan ma he drag brgyug lcags rmig can //
analyzed: stobs ldan ma he drag brgyug lcags rmig can //
translated: The powerful buffalo runs with iron hooves,

original: aog yu 'bar zhing rva rno nyi ma'i gdan //
analyzed: aog yu 'bar zhing rva rno nyi ma'i gdan //
translated: with burning eyebrows, sharp horns, and a sun seat.

original: khyod kyi sku ni char sprin lta bu ste //
analyzed: khyod kyi sku ni char sprin lta bu ste //
translated: Your body is like a rain cloud,

original: zhal gsum pa la phyag drug rnam par mdzes //
analyzed: zhal gsum pa la phyag drug rnam par mdzes //
translated: with three faces and six hands, very beautiful.

original: mgo skyes kham pa sma ra gyen du 'greng //üîΩrigs bzhi'i klu dang phyag rgya lnga yis ni //
analyzed: mgo skyes kham pa sma ra gyen du 'greng // rigs bzhi'i klu dang phyag rgya lnga yis ni //
translated: Your hair is tawny, your moustache stands on end,üîΩand your head is adorned with the five symbolic ornaments

original: khyod kyi dbu ni mdzes par brgyan pa yin //
analyzed: khyod kyi dbu ni mdzes par brgyan pa yin //
translated: of the four classes of nƒÅgas.

original: smin mtshams par ni mthong nas nges par 'jigs //
analyzed: smin mtshams par ni mthong nas nges par 'jigs //
translated: Seeing the terrifying one between your eyebrows,üîΩyour nine eyes like burning embers, turned upward,

original: me mdag lta bu'i spyan dgu gyen du bzlog / gyen 'bud shangs nas zhe sdang gdug pa'i sprul //
analyzed: me mdag lta bu'i spyan dgu gyen du bzlog / gyen 'bud shangs nas zhe sdang gdug pa'i sprul //
translated: from your upturned nose, the emanation of hatred and poison,

original: khrag gis brlan pa'i zhal ni shin tu bgrad //
analyzed: khrag gis brlan pa'i zhal ni shin tu bgrad //
translated: your mouth, wet with blood, is very wide open.

original: mche ba zla tshes zang yag 'bar ba gtsigs //
analyzed: mche ba zla tshes zang yag 'bar ba gtsigs //
translated: You bare your fangs, crescent moons, and a blazing brow.

original: rngam pa'i h'um sgrogs ljags ni gyen du 'dril //
analyzed: rngam pa'i h'um sgrogs ljags ni gyen du 'dril //
translated: You utter the terrifying sound of h≈´·πÉ, and your tongue rolls upward.

original: sha za'i mgo bcad lus kyi rgyan du thogs //
analyzed: sha za'i mgo bcad lus kyi rgyan du thogs //
translated: You wear as ornaments on your body the severed heads of rƒÅk·π£asas.

original: nga rgyal kun 'phrog mi thung 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
analyzed: nga rgyal kun 'phrog mi thung 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
translated: You are the terrifying dwarf who conquers all pride.

original: bdud bzhi 'joms mdzad @110a * //
analyzed: bdud bzhi 'joms mdzad @110a * //
translated: You are the one who conquers the four mƒÅras.

original: 'khor lo 'bar ba sta //
analyzed: 'khor lo 'bar ba sta //
translated: You are the blazing wheel.

original: shes rab gnyis med ral gri thabs kyis gdengs //
analyzed: shes rab gnyis med ral gri thabs kyis gdengs //
translated: You brandish the sword of nondual wisdom with skillful means.

original: las kyi dbyug pa dag gis 'chi bdag 'joms //üîΩnyon mongs bsreg mkhas phyag gis 'khor ba bsdigs //
analyzed: las kyi dbyug pa dag gis 'chi bdag 'joms // nyon mongs bsreg mkhas phyag gis 'khor ba bsdigs //
translated: You conquer the Lord of Death with the club of karma.üîΩYou are skilled in burning afflictions, and with your hand you destroy sa·πÉsƒÅra.

original: nyon mongs gcod mdzad shes rab dgra sta gdengs //
analyzed: nyon mongs gcod mdzad shes rab dgra sta gdengs //
translated: You brandish the axe of wisdom that cuts through afflictions.

original: log par lta ba bde ba chen por 'ching //
analyzed: log par lta ba bde ba chen por 'ching //
translated: You bind wrong views in great bliss.

original: rigs dang shes rab pha rol phyin par ldan //
analyzed: rigs dang shes rab pha rol phyin par ldan //
translated: You possess the perfection of wisdom and lineage.

original: gsus pa che la thur du bshal ba dang // mtshams thung rngam chen khyod ni mthong bas 'jigs //
analyzed: gsus pa che la thur du bshal ba dang // mtshams thung rngam chen khyod ni mthong bas 'jigs //
translated: You are terrifying to behold, with a large belly, a short waist, and great wrath.

original: gcan gzan rgan po stag gi na bzas brgyan //
analyzed: gcan gzan rgan po stag gi na bzas brgyan //
translated: You are adorned with the hide of an old tiger, a beast of prey.

original: yan lag lnga ni klu lngas legs par dkris //
analyzed: yan lag lnga ni klu lngas legs par dkris //
translated: Your five limbs are well-bound with five snakes.

original: zag pa med pa'i bde bas kun la khyab //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i bde bas kun la khyab //
translated: You are pervaded by untainted bliss.

original: bskal ba 'jigs pa'i me yi nang na bzhugs //
analyzed: bskal ba 'jigs pa'i me yi nang na bzhugs //
translated: You dwell in the terrifying fire of the eon.

original: rab tu mdzes pa'i sku 'bar 'od tshogs can //
analyzed: rab tu mdzes pa'i sku 'bar 'od tshogs can //
translated: Your beautiful body is radiant with light.

original: thabs dang shes rab bde bas gnyis med 'khril //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab bde bas gnyis med 'khril //
translated: Method and wisdom, blissfully embracing nonduality.

original: rab brjid gshin rje gshed po'i sku mthong na //
analyzed: rab brjid gshin rje gshed po'i sku mthong na //
translated: When you see the majestic form of Yamantaka,

original: khro bo'i rgyal po gzhan gyi lag ca 'chor //
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po gzhan gyi lag ca 'chor //
translated: The king of wrathful ones, the possessions of others are lost.

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyang khyod la bstod //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyang khyod la bstod //
translated: Even the buddhas of the three times praise you.

original: rngam pa'i 'khor tshogs rab tu 'jigs mdzad pa //
analyzed: rngam pa'i 'khor tshogs rab tu 'jigs mdzad pa //
translated: The terrifying assembly of your retinue is extremely frightening.

original: 'jam dpal gshin rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gshin rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the form of Manjushri Yamantaka.

original: 'khor lo bzhi yi bde ba khyod la gnas //
analyzed: 'khor lo bzhi yi bde ba khyod la gnas //
translated: The bliss of the four wheels abides in you.

original: dri med rnam dag gsung ni yang dag sgrogs //
analyzed: dri med rnam dag gsung ni yang dag sgrogs //
translated: Your stainless, pure speech proclaims the truth.

original: hr'i: shtri / sngags kyis srid gsum gdug pa 'dul //
analyzed: hr'i: shtri / sngags kyis srid gsum gdug pa 'dul //
translated: With the mantra hrih shtrh, you tame the evil of the three worlds.

original: rdo rje phag mo rab tu dgyes mdzad ma //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo rab tu dgyes mdzad ma //
translated: Vajravarahi, you bring about great delight.

original: ha ha bzhad pa'i dregs pas dgyes mdzad cing //
analyzed: ha ha bzhad pa'i dregs pas dgyes mdzad cing //
translated: With the arrogance of laughing ha ha, you bring about delight.

original: gdug pa za byed rgyal ba'i gsung mchog la //
analyzed: gdug pa za byed rgyal ba'i gsung mchog la //
translated: The supreme speech of the victorious one who devours evil

original: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rnams kyis mgrin gcig bstod //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rnams kyis mgrin gcig bstod //
translated: is praised in one voice by the victorious ones of the ten directions.üîΩThe speech of the victorious one is the pure wheel.

original: rgyal ba gsung ba 'khor lo rnam par dag / mgon po gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: rgyal ba gsung ba 'khor lo rnam par dag / mgon po gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the protector Yamantaka.

original: nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i 'gro don mdzad //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i 'gro don mdzad //
translated: You benefit beings equal to the limits of space.

original: phrin las thogs pa med pa phyogs bcur khyab //
analyzed: phrin las thogs pa med pa phyogs bcur khyab //
translated: Your activity is unobstructed and pervades the ten directions.

original: las kyi 'khrul 'khor khyod kyis gcod mdzad cing //
analyzed: las kyi 'khrul 'khor khyod kyis gcod mdzad cing //
translated: You cut through the mechanisms of karma,

original: phrin las bzhi yi 'khor lo rdzogs mdzad pa //
analyzed: phrin las bzhi yi 'khor lo rdzogs mdzad pa //
translated: And perfect the wheel of the four activities.

original: khro bo'i rgyal po zhe sdang gshin rje gshed //
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po zhe sdang gshin rje gshed //
translated: Wrathful King, Hatred Yamantaka,

original: sku gsung rdzogs mdzad 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed //
analyzed: sku gsung rdzogs mdzad 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed //
translated: You perfect body, speech, and mind, Manjushri Yamantaka.

original: gdug pa za byed 'jam dpal gshin rje'i sku //
analyzed: gdug pa za byed 'jam dpal gshin rje'i sku //
translated: You devour the vicious, the form of Manjushri Yamantaka.

original: phrin las mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: phrin las mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: You perfect activity, to you I offer praise.

original: gang zhig dus gsum dag tu 'di dag gis //
analyzed: gang zhig dus gsum dag tu 'di dag gis //
translated: Whoever, in the three times,

original: rtog med gus pa sems kyis gang bstod pa //
analyzed: rtog med gus pa sems kyis gang bstod pa //
translated: With a mind of nonconceptual devotion, praises these,

original: de ni rgyal ba thams cad bstod pas @110b na //
analyzed: de ni rgyal ba thams cad bstod pas @110b na //
translated: By praising all the Victorious Ones,

original: che gcig gis ni gshin rje gshed 'drar 'gyur //
analyzed: che gcig gis ni gshin rje gshed 'drar 'gyur //
translated: They will become just like Yamantaka.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pas gshin rje gshed po la bstod pa le'u'i rgyud las bstod pa'i le'u'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pas gshin rje gshed po la bstod pa le'u'i rgyud las bstod pa'i le'u'o //
translated: The praise chapter from the tantra of the praise of Yamantaka by Vajrapani.
